strings.SS2_PYRO_DESCRIPTION: The Pyro is a survivor who excels in crowd control, torching anything that dares come too close.
strings.SS2_PYRO_OUTRO_FLAVOR: ..and so he left, chest ready to burst.
strings.SS2_PYRO_SCORCH_DESCRIPTION: <color=#D78326>Heat up</color> by <style=cIsDamage>burning nearby enemies for <style=cIsDamage>60% damage</style>. Hitting enemies with <color=#D78326>high heat</color> <style=cIsDamage>ignites</style> enemies, <style=cIsDamage>dealing damage over time</style>.
strings.SS2_PYRO_AIRBLAST_DESCRIPTION: <color=#D78326>30% heat</color>. Fire a burst of flames, <color=#D78326>igniting</color> enemies for <style=cIsDamage>400% damage</style> and <style=cIsUtility>reflecting projectiles</style>. Extra stocks <color=#D78326>reduce heat consumption by 15%</color>.
